item.title: Thucydides – Web Testing for Devs – Event this Thursday March 1st
item.dc:creator: conor
item.description: The Irish Software Developer Network (ISDN – love it!) is running an event this Thursday all about automated web testing. In this talk, John Ferguson Smart will look at the advantages of using Selenium 2/WebDriver for your web tests, and see what Thucydides brings to the party. It kicks off at 6.30pm at the TCube, [...]
item.content:encoded:
The Irish Software Developer Network (ISDN – love it!) is running an event this Thursday all about automated web testing.

In this talk, John Ferguson Smart will look at the advantages of using Selenium 2/WebDriver for your web tests, and see what Thucydides brings to the party.

It kicks off at 6.30pm at the TCube, 32-34 Castle St, Dublin. Free beer and pizza too.

All the details and info about the live stream over on IrishDev.
